backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing booking management, service rates, time slot availability, image path configuration, user profiles, and admin authorization with access control mixins for blob storage and authentication.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the implementation of Google Ads tracking tag (gtag.js) with conversion ID AW-17968689708 in frontend/index.html.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components including pages, layouts, marketing sections, booking forms, admin interfaces, and custom hooks for the ceiling services application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components including sidebar, charts, and semantic tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with Google Ads gtag.js tracking (AW-17968689708), Google site verification meta tag, SEO metadata for ceiling services, and Inter font preloading.
frontend/public/googlea0b8f9f5757853f9.h: Google site verification file for domain ownership confirmation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home (/), admin (/riyaz), and account (/account), wrapped in QueryClientProvider with shared layout including header, footer, and toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/BookingsTa: Admin bookings table component displaying sorted bookings by creation date with CSV export functionality and enhanced error handling showing backend error messages.
frontend/src/components/admin/ImagesEdit: Admin interface for uploading and managing images including hero image, four service cards, and gallery images with file validation (type and 5MB size limit) and upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/admin/ServiceRat: Admin component for editing per-square-foot pricing for three services (POP/Gypsum, PVC, Wall Molding) with form inputs and save functionality using React hooks and mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/TimeSlotsE: Admin component for toggling availability of four booking time slots (10am, 1pm, 4pm, 7pm) with switches and save functionality.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminAccess: Empty file, likely intended for admin authentication/authorization gating logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLoginF: Empty file, likely intended for admin login form UI.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingS: Customer-facing booking form with fields for personal info, property details, service selection, date/time slot picker, and area input; includes validation, success messaging, and preselected service support.
frontend/src/components/booking/bookingV: Validation logic for booking form fields including name, mobile number (10-digit Indian format), location, property type, service, date (future only), time slot, and area (positive number).
frontend/src/components/conversion/Float: Fixed-position WhatsApp chat button that normalizes phone numbers and links to WhatsApp with the configured business number.
frontend/src/components/conversion/Stick: Mobile-only sticky bottom bar with a 'Book Consultation' button that triggers a callback when clicked.
frontend/src/components/estimate/Estimat: Live cost calculator that computes estimates based on area and selected service using service rates, with special handling for inspection-based services.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Site footer displaying company info, contact details, service list, copyright notice, and attribution link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Sticky header with logo/brand link, account navigation button, and call-to-action phone button.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Marketing section displaying contact information (phone, email, service areas) in a three-column grid with icons.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Galler: Displays a before/after gallery section with default or custom images in a 2-column grid layout. Accepts optional galleryImages prop to override default before/after images.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HeroSe: Hero section component with background image, headline, pricing info, and CTA buttons for booking consultation and calling. Accepts optional custom hero image path.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HowItW: Displays a 3-step process section (Book, Site Visit, Installation) in a grid layout with icons and descriptions for each step.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Review: Shows customer reviews in a 3-column card grid with star ratings, review text, and customer name/location.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Sectio: Reusable section wrapper component with optional scroll-reveal animation, variant styling (white/grey background), and container layout.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Displays service cards in a 4-column grid with images, pricing, descriptions, and Book Now buttons. Supports custom service images with fallback to defaults and handles image loading errors.
frontend/src/components/marketing/WhyCho: Shows three reasons to choose the service (Affordable, Skilled Experts, On-Time Delivery) in a centered 3-column grid with icons.
frontend/src/config/ceilingPro.ts: Configuration object containing contact information (phone, WhatsApp, email) for Ceiling Pro business.
frontend/src/context/AdminAuthContext.ts: Empty file, likely placeholder for admin authentication context.
frontend/src/domain/services.ts: Defines service data model and array of four ceiling services (POP/Gypsum, PVC, Wall Molding, Gypsum Repair) with pricing, descriptions, and image paths. Includes helper function to get service rates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, initializing access control with admin token from URL params.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminActor.ts: React Query hook that creates anonymous backend actor for admin dashboard (/riyaz) with hardcoded 'caffeine' admin token for access control initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuth.ts: Empty file, likely placeholder for admin authentication hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookings.ts: React Query hooks for fetching all bookings (admin), user's bookings, and creating new bookings via backend actor with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useImagePaths.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and update image paths for hero, service cards, and gallery images, converting backend StoredImage objects to direct URLs for rendering.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageUpload.ts: Provides React Query mutation hooks for uploading single or multiple images with validation (type, size), progress tracking, and automatic path generation using ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider with AuthClient integration, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCallerAdmin.ts: React Query hook that checks if the current caller has admin privileges by querying the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: Custom hook using IntersectionObserver to detect when an element becomes visible during scroll, respecting prefers-reduced-motion preference.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceRates.ts: React Query hooks to fetch and update service rates (popGypsum, pvc, wallMolding) with default fallback values.
frontend/src/hooks/useTimeSlotAvailabili: React Query hooks to fetch and update availability status for four daily time slots (10am, 1pm, 4pm, 7pm).
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: React Query hooks to fetch and save the current caller's user profile with proper actor dependency handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes using natural green and beige color palette, plus base styling for typography and responsive spacing.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Account page component handling authentication flow, profile setup for new users, and displaying user bookings with logout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page that renders four editor components: ImagesEditor, ServiceRatesEditor, TimeSlotsEditor, and BookingsTable for managing website content and bookings.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main homepage component that renders all marketing sections (hero, services, gallery, etc.), handles scroll-to-booking functionality, and passes image paths from API to child components.
frontend/src/state/bookingPrefill.ts: Zustand store for managing preselected service state used to prefill the booking form and trigger auto-scroll to booking section.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and cleanup helpers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system, extended theme tokens for UI components (sidebar, chart, card, etc.), custom animations, and typography/container-query plugins.
project_state.json: Project state document defining the Ceiling Pro booking website requirements, architectural decisions (no email, fixed time slots, /riyaz admin route), and known issues including missing bookings in admin dashboard and service image problems.
